source_objects.title: Interior Design
source_objects.description: Learn how to layout your furniture, decorate, pick the right paint color, update your kitchen, and more.

Set up light in your scenes much cooler then ever!

items.title: How to Install Carpet Tile and Vinyl Planking
items.headline: Learn how you can save MONEY and have fun doing your own carpentry work yourself. You don't even need to be a handyman!
objectives_summary: Laying different types of flooring. From carpet tile to vinyl planking. Two of the most popular flooring styles for all kinds of commercial and private properties currently being built

items.headline: A Guide to Creating Your Best Home Using Feng Shui Inspired Design
objectives_summary: You will have a space that they're proud of, that makes their daily lives run smoothly, that supports their higher aspirations.
You will have the confidence and know-how to redesign other spaces.

Understand how lighting works and how each design concept benefits the public in terms of safety and security.

items.title: Interior design: A course full of design secrets & mystery
items.headline: Learn to Interpret space and enhance the way we live today using colour, layout, elements, lighting, furniture & fabric
